entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
